content: As an AI, I don't have personal preferences. However, Jemaa el-Fnaa is known as the heart of Marrakech's old city and is the most famous market in the city. It's a great place to start your Marrakech market experience and immerse yourself in the city's vibrant atmosphere. From there, you can explore other famous markets like Souk Semmarine or Rahba Kedima to find the unique goods you are interested in buying.
